title: Here are the best AirPods deals you can get right now
author: Sheena Vasani
content:
If you know where to look, there are typically some great discounts available on Apple’s popular — yet oftentimes expensive — AirPods. Since Apple launched the third-gen AirPods in October and unveiled its new lineup, we’ve seen the starting price of the second-gen, entry-level model drop from $159 to $129. What’s more, we’ve seen many retailers starting to heavily discount the second-gen AirPods as well as the more expensive AirPods Pro and Max, which offer noise cancellation and better sound quality than the standard model. We’ve even recently seen some significant discounts on the third-gen model, despite how recently they launched.

Here, we’ll run through the best deals available on each model, including the entry-level AirPods, the AirPods Pro, the third-gen AirPods, and the AirPods Max.

The best entry-level AirPods (second-gen) deals

Once $159, Apple recently lowered the list price of the second-gen AirPods — now the entry-level model — to $129. It only sells the model with a wired charging case, however, which charges via a standard Lightning cable. Despite their age, we found these easy-to-use earbuds offer great wireless performance and reliable battery life, making them a great pick if you can live without a wireless charging case.

At the moment, Apple’s most affordable pair of earbuds are currently on sale at Amazon and Target for around $119, which is $30 more than their most recent sale price.

The best AirPods (third-gen) deals

Apple’s newest pair of true wireless earbuds support the company’s MagSafe technology. The short stems make for a more subtle design, while improved sound and features like sweat and water resistance, support for spatial audio with dynamic head tracking, and improved battery life render them a nice improvement over the last-gen model.

Deals were once hard to come by on the third-gen model, but we finally started seeing some worthwhile deals starting around Black Friday and Cyber Monday. Unfortunately, however, many of the more significant sales have ended and Apple’s third-gen AirPods are only available right now at Amazon, Target, Walmart, and B&H Photo for around $170. The earbuds normally retail for $179, meaning the current sale price is substantially less than their all-time low of $139.99.

The best AirPods Pro deals

We think Apple’s premium true wireless earbuds, the AirPods Pro, are the best wireless earbuds an iPhone owner can buy, regardless of the price. They have better sound quality than the models above, offer active noise cancellation, and come with a wireless charging case. The earbuds also support Apple’s spatial audio feature, which adds an immersive surround sound effect to select content, and come with swappable silicone tips.

In October, Apple launched a new version of the AirPods Pro with a wireless charging case that supports Apple’s MagSafe technology, just like the third-gen AirPods. These retail for $249, but you can buy them right now for $189.99 at Target. That’s not nearly as low as the $159 price we saw this model drop to during Black Friday and Cyber Monday, but it’s still $60 off what you’d pay if you were to purchase the earbuds directly from Apple. Amazon also has them on sale, but for slightly more, selling the latest model for $197.

The best AirPods Max deals

The AirPods Max aren’t the iconic in-ear style that has become synonymous with the AirPods name. They’re large and luxurious, comprised of aluminum, steel, and mesh fabric that remains comfortable during extended listening sessions. They also sport excellent noise cancellation, Apple’s spatial audio feature, and a wide, balanced sound, even if they lag behind some of their peers when it comes to bass response. They’re not the best noise-canceling headphones for most people — blame the $550 sticker price — but it’s hard to find a pair of Bluetooth headphones that sound better and feature more intuitive controls.

Although the AirPods Max were discounted to $429 on Amazon during Black Friday and Cyber Monday, prices have since increased. Still, the Max are currently on sale in several styles at Amazon for $449.99, one of their better prices to date (discount applies at checkout). You can also buy them in various colors at Micro Center for $439.99, though they’re only available for in-store pickup in select cities and states.
description: Even Apple’s third-gen AirPods are on sale.
